types.html:
n'en plus pouvoir

  1. to be exhausted
  2. to be overwhelmed
  3. to be unable to take any more; to have had it with; to be fed up with; to be sick and tired of [with de ‘something’]
    • 2018, Zaz, Résigne-moi:
      J'en peux plus d' me faire espérer. J'ai plus confiance en ta lumière, sans tes caresses qui m'allumaient.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

See also

[edit]
  • n'en pouvoir mais
trans: to be unable to take any more
